sentences.english: The monochromator has a large horizontal collection angle.
sentences.chinese: 这个单色器有很大的水平接收角。

sentences.english: The final result is a color painting on top of a monochrome painting.
sentences.chinese: 最后的结果是在单色画上再画上颜色。

sentences.english: The paper studies the principle of homochromous beam grating scanning.
sentences.chinese: 着重分析了单色光束的光栅扫描理论。

sentences.english: A method of making true color moving holograms with one-wavelength laser is proposed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用单色激光器制作真彩色动感全息图的方法。
添加一个400%的高斯单色噪点。

sentences.english: Horses live in a monochrome world.
sentences.chinese: 马则生活在一个单色的世界里。

sentences.english: The spectrophotometer UV365 is a research grade instrument with the double-monochromator.
sentences.chinese: UV365分光光度计是一台双单色仪研究型仪器。

sentences.english: Suppose someone gave you a pen – a sealed, solid-colored pen.
sentences.chinese: 如不美观有人送你一支笔，一支不构怨卸的单色钢笔。

sentences.english: The expected performance of the monochromator could be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 可以得到预期的单色器性能。

sentences.english: While color monitors usually offer a wide selection of display colors.
sentences.chinese: 彩色显示器通常提供许多种可供选择的单色。

sentences.english: I create works in the purpose of the modern monochrome combining these characters.
sentences.chinese: 我以融合这些特点的现代性单色画为目标而创作作品。

sentences.english: After passing through aperture on a plate, the monochromatic light is separated into three parallel beams at different depths.
sentences.chinese: 通过孔板后的单色光被分成三个不同高度的平行光束。

sentences.english: This obviously is the limiting case of the idealized monochromatic wave .
sentences.chinese: 这必然是理想化的单色波的极限波形。

sentences.english: Take care to note if the ties are solid colors or a mix of colors.
sentences.chinese: 留心领带的颜色是单色还是混合色。

sentences.english: It is also called as monochrome conversion.
sentences.chinese: 这种技术也叫做单色转换。

sentences.english: Good homochromous-show; gentle beam, efficient irradiance.
sentences.chinese: 单色性好，光线柔和，发光效率高。
